vaccineGroup.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hepatitis B
vaccineGroup.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hepatitis B vaccine.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to yeast.

vaccine.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient is pregnant.

Do not vaccinate if the patient has progressive neurologic disorder until a treatment regimen has been
					established and the condition has stabilized.

vaccine.observationTitle: Encephalopathy not attributable to another identifiable cause within 7 days of administration of a previous dose of Tdap, DTP, or DTaP vaccine
vaccine.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had encephalopathy not attributable to another identifiable cause within 7 days of administration of a previous dose of Tdap, DTP, or DTaP vaccine.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to neomycin.

vaccine.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction to polymyxin B
vaccine.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to polymyxin B.
